title: Australian Data Center Startup Arkon Expands to U.S. With $26M in Fresh Funding
description: CEO Joshua Payne said he expects the acquisition of a data center in Hannibal, Ohio to be "the first of several" over the next year.

title: Bitcoin (BTC) Price Analysis Report – 20 June 2023
description: Introduction Bitcoin (BTC), the world’s first and most popular cryptocurrency, is currently (as of 9:04 a.m. UTC on 20 June 2023) trading, on Binance, at $26,767.0, marking a 1.32% increase from the previous day. title: Bitcoin market cap reclaims crypto dominance with 50% share
description: Bitcoin has surpassed the combined market capitalization of all other cryptocurrencies, according to recent data from TradingView. title: Embracing the New Era of Storage: Delving into Storj and Filecoin’s Disruptive Solutions
description: Storj and Filecoin are decentralized storage platforms offering secure alternatives to traditional cloud storage. Storj uses its own protocol, while Filecoin utilizes the InterPlanetary File System (IPFS) and operates as a blockchain-based solution. In the world of blockchain-based storage, Storj and Filecoin have emerged as notable players. Both platforms aim to provide secure and decentralized [...]

title: Binance’s BNB Chain Unleashes opBNB Testnet: Unlocking Lightning-Fast Transactions and Lower Costs
description: BNB Chain has introduced a new layer-2 chain to tackle its scalability issue. The new layer-2 scaling solution, built upon the Optimism OP Stack, aims to enhance the security and scalability on Binance blockchain network BNB Chain, a blockchain established by Binance, has introduced a new layer-2 chain to tackle its scalability issue. title: Indonesia’s Largest Web3 Competition Attracted Hundreds of Participants
description:
Web3 Weekend Asia (W3W), the first and largest community-based competition in Indonesia, was successfully organized by Coinvestasi and BlockDevId, with backing from Google Cloud. The event, which drew over 160 people, provided a platform and chances for Indonesian crypto developers and builders to create creative and helpful products. Let’s discover more about this web3 event. […]

title: Billionaire Stanley Druckenmiller Names One Tech Sector That Could Print Gains Despite Recession Threats
description:
Billionaire investor Stanley Druckenmiller says he is upbeat on one nascent technology sector even amid signs of a looming recession. In a recent interview with Bloomberg, Druckenmiller says that artificial intelligence (AI) technology is a “huge thing” and could be as revolutionary as the internet.
